mapper.insert: insert into E_MP_SSL_CURVE (MPED_ID, DATA_TIME, PS_FLAG, UA, UB, UC, IA, IB, IC, I0, P, PA, PB, PC, Q, QA, QB, QC, COS, COSA, COSB, COSC, SP, SPA, SPB, SPC, FN, PAIA, PAIB, PAIC, PAUA, PAUB, PAUC, TEMPLE, AVGP, AVGQ, P_COEF, Q_COEF, V_COEF, C_COEF, FACTOR_COEF, SAVEDATETIME, AREA_CODE ) values (#{mpedId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{dataTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{psFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ua,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{ub,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{uc,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{ia,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{ib,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{ic,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{i0,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{p,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{pa,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{pb,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{pc,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{q,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{qa,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{qb,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{qc,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{cos,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{cosa,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{cosb,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{cosc,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{sp,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{spa,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{spb,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{spc,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{fn,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{paia,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{paib,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{paic,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{paua,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{paub,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{pauc,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{temple,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{avgp,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{avgq,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{pCoef,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{qCoef,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{vCoef,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{cCoef,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{factorCoef,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{savedatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{areaCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.sql: MPED_ID, DATA_TIME, MODIFY_FLAG,P1R0, P1R0_P, P2R0,P2R0_P, P3R0, P3R0_P,P4R0, P4R0_P, P5R0,P5R0_P, P6R0, P6R0_P,P7R0, P7R0_P, P8R0, P8R0_P, P1R1, P2R1,P3R1, P4R1, P5R1, P6R1,P7R1, P8R1, P1R2, P2R2,P3R2, P4R2, P5R2, P6R2,P7R2, P8R2, P1R3, P2R3, P3R3, P4R3, P5R3, P6R3,P7R3, P8R3, P1R4, P2R4,P3R4, P4R4, P5R4, P6R4,P7R4, P8R4, P1R5, P2R5,P3R5, P4R5, P5R5, P6R5, P7R5, P8R5, AP_COEF,RP_COEF, SAVEDATETIME, AREA_CODE,"STATUS"
